Teach me about the components of the cardiovascular system and their functions. After explaining the heart, blood vessels, and blood circulation, and include a test at the end, and let me know if my answers are correct after I respond, without providing the answers beforehand.

1. Receives deoxygenated blood from the body and pumps it to the lungs for oxygenation.  2. Capillaries 3. Systemic Circulation: Carries oxygenated blood from the left side of the heart to the body and returns deoxygenated blood to the right side of the heart.
Pulmonary Circulation: Carries deoxygenated blood from the right side of the heart to the lungs for oxygenation and returns oxygenated blood to the left side of the heart.
